results.name: Expansion of (1-x)^(-1)/(1-2*x+x^2+x^3).
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3,-3,0,1).
program: (MAGMA) I:=[1,3,6,9]; [n le 4 select I[n] else 3*Self(n-1)-3*Self(n-2)+Self(n-4): n in [1..50]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, May 27 2016
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 17 2002
